___pumps.description: list of pumps located at this station

items.description: pumpId values for pump located at this station

___premium.description: tankid value of the premium fuel tank located at this station

___diesel.description: tankid value of the diesel fuel tank located at this station

___regular.description: tankid value of the regular fuel tank located at this station

___cityid.description: unique identifier of the city where this station is located

___city.description: viewable city name where the station is located
